DescriptionData.Title: Jump Rope, Speed Skipping Rope, PVC Double-layer Reinforced Design, Refuse to Entangle Adult, Men and Women Workout Equipment
DescriptionData.Description:
Welcome to LYTLD. Every day, keep exercising and make your and your family healthy and happy lives. Skipping is an indispensable sport.

★ The Benefits of Skipping Rope
1. Skipping on the body's sensitivity, physical posture, balance, coordination and flexibility have a good role in promoting. It is beneficial to development, especially lower limb strength.
2. Skipping can help children grow taller.
3. Skipping is effective and economical way to burn fat.

★ Features
1. Lightweight when using, feel light and natural.
2. It is non-toxic and odorless and has a smooth surface to grip comfortably.
3. Easily adjustable / cuttable any size
4. Very strong, not knotted.
5. It is suitable for indoor or outdoor activity
6. Perfect for your kids as a birthday or Christmas gift.

★ Specifications:
Material: ABS+PVC
Color: blue, red, green, pink
Applicable scene: fitness equipment, fitness body
Uses: weight loss, fitness, entertainment, training
Rope size: 2.8m(110.2in)

★ Package List:
1 x Jump Rope

★ Note:
- There may be 1 inch difference in measurement since it is hand measured.Hope you do not mind it.
- There may be a little color difference due to different monitor settings.Thank you for your understanding.
- Because there will be slight errors in manual measurement, pay attention to cutting along the buckle when adjusting the length of the rope.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: PVC JUMP ROPE: Accord with artificial study design, the palm has enough space, the wrist gently hair force can accelerate.

ADJUST ROPE LENGTH: beginners according to their own height to adjust the length of the rope, the specific way: feet together on the rope, holding the handle in both hands, pull until the appropriate length of the armpit.
LIGHTWEIGHT AND PROTABLE: Being feather-light makes it easily and conveniently portable so that you can achieve maximum fat burn, tone your muscles and reach peak fitness anywhere.
GOOD FOR HEALTH: Skipping can speed up your child's blood circulation, improve breathing and physical coordination, and increase teamwork awareness.

CUSTOMER SERVICE: If you have any questions, please contact us(LYTLD) and we will solve it within 24 hours. Please feel free to contact our customer service team to give feedback on your situation. We are very happy to provide guidance and services.
DescriptionData.SearchTerms: skipping rope adjustable jump aluminum alloy speed ropes loss weight boxing indoor outdoor exercises fat burning adjuster premium high spec aluminium conditioning hiit interval training automatic counting professional exercise fast calorie
